@invalidname Think of it like this: transform closing punctuation into a joining/attributive comma, EXCEPT where you would either be:

1. Doubling-up punctuation (e.g. "!," or "—,"), or
2. Damaging meaning/grammar (e.g. turning "?" into ",")

When in doubt, grab a book and check.
